hero.title: DELTARUNE CHAPTER 4

overview.title: Chapter Overview
overview.description: DELTARUNE Chapter 4 is the most complex and challenging chapter in the entire game, released on June 5, 2025, alongside Chapter 3. This DELTARUNE chapter explores deeper story themes, including extensive character development, complex puzzle systems, and multiple branching endings. Chapter 4 of DELTARUNE contains more content than the first three chapters combined, making it the climax of the entire DELTARUNE experience.

control.title: üéÆ Control Ending
control.description: Maintain player control over Kris throughout DELTARUNE Chapter 4. Make choices that assert player dominance and ignore Kris's autonomous actions. This ending emphasizes the meta-narrative of game control.

freedom.title: üïäÔ∏è Freedom Ending
freedom.description: Allow Kris to break free from player control in DELTARUNE Chapter 4. Support their autonomous decisions and respect their individual will. This ending explores themes of character agency.

balance.title: ‚öñÔ∏è Balance Ending
balance.description: Achieve harmony between player and character in DELTARUNE. Make collaborative decisions that respect both player intent and Kris's personality. This ending promotes cooperation.

sacrifice.title: üíî Sacrifice Ending
sacrifice.description: Choose the path where Kris makes the ultimate sacrifice in DELTARUNE Chapter 4. This emotionally intense ending requires specific story choices and character development paths.

secret.title: üîê Secret Ending
secret.description: Unlock the hidden ending in DELTARUNE Chapter 4 by collecting all secrets, achieving perfect character relationships, and discovering the truth behind the Dark Worlds. Requirements are complex but rewarding.
